description: Registers a volume to its FreeSurfer anatomical using Local Pearson Correlation (LPC) (the AFNI lpc_align.py program). Creates a FreeSurfer register.dat file.

subject_id.title: Subject ID
subject_id.description: Subject ID found in SUBJECTS_DIR. The reference volume is the mri/brain volume (modifiable with --fsvol). Converted to analyze using mri_convert.

mov_volume.title: Movable Volume
mov_volume.description: Volume identifier of the movable volume. Must be specified suitably for mri_convert. Uses first frame unless --frame is specified.

reg_file.title: Registration File
reg_file.description: Output registration file mapping RAS in the reference to RAS in the movable. The file/matrix format is understood by freesurfer.

dof_9.title: 9 DOF Flag
dof_9.description: Use 9 degrees of freedom; default is 6.

dof_12.title: 12 DOF Flag
dof_12.description: Use 12 degrees of freedom; default is 6.

frame_number.title: Frame Number
frame_number.description: Specify the frame number other than the first. For SPM analyze, specify the file corresponding to the desired frame as each file only has one frame.

mid_frame.title: Mid Frame Flag
mid_frame.description: Register to the middle frame of the mov volume as the template. Cannot be used with --frame.

fsvol.title: FreeSurfer Volume
fsvol.description: Use FreeSurfer volume id; default is brainmask.

output_volume.title: Output Volume
output_volume.description: Output volume file for resampled mov.
